description: Design, Build, Finance, Operate and Maintain the New Champlain Bridge and its corridor, including the new Ile des Soeurs Bridge and reconstruction and widening of the federal portion of Highway 15.
comments: New Champlain Bridge Corridor project. This contract was awarded following a competitive process, and is valued at $3,977,352,513 (before taxes), as announced on June 19, 2015. This is a multi-year contract ending in October 2049.
